00028 #ifndef _Codec_H__
00029 #define _Codec_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgreSharedPtr.h"
00033 #include "OgreDataStream.h"
00034 #include "OgreIteratorWrappers.h"
00035 #include "OgreStringVector.h"
00036 #include "OgreException.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Ogre {
00055     class _OgreExport Codec : public CodecAlloc
00056     {
00057     protected:
00058         typedef map< String, Codec* >::type CodecList; 
00061         static CodecList ms_mapCodecs;
00062 
00063     public:
00064         class _OgrePrivate CodecData : public CodecAlloc
00065         {
00066         public:
00067             virtual ~CodecData() {}
00068 
00071             virtual String dataType() const { return "CodecData"; }
00072         };
00073         typedef SharedPtr<CodecData> CodecDataPtr;
00074 
00075         typedef ConstMapIterator<CodecList> CodecIterator;
00076 
00077     public:
00078         virtual ~Codec();
00079         
00082         static void registerCodec( Codec *pCodec )
00083         {
00084             CodecList::iterator i = ms_mapCodecs.find(pCodec->getType());
00085             if (i != ms_mapCodecs.end())
00086                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_DUPLICATE_ITEM, 
00087                     pCodec->getType() + " already has a registered codec. ", __FUNCTION__);
00088 
00089             ms_mapCodecs[pCodec->getType()] = pCodec;
00090         }
00091 
00094         static bool isCodecRegistered( const String& codecType )
00095         {
00096             return ms_mapCodecs.find(codecType) != ms_mapCodecs.end();
00097         }
00098 
00101         static void unRegisterCodec( Codec *pCodec )
00102         {
00103             ms_mapCodecs.erase(pCodec->getType());
00104         }
00105 
00107         static CodecIterator getCodecIterator(void)
00108         {
00109             return CodecIterator(ms_mapCodecs.begin(), ms_mapCodecs.end());
00110         }
00111 
00113         static StringVector getExtensions(void);
00114 
00116         static Codec* getCodec(const String& extension);
00117 
00124         static Codec* getCodec(char *magicNumberPtr, size_t maxbytes);
00125 
00129         virtual DataStreamPtr code(MemoryDataStreamPtr& input, CodecDataPtr& pData) const = 0;
00137         virtual void codeToFile(MemoryDataStreamPtr& input, const String& outFileName, CodecDataPtr& pData) const = 0;
00138 
00140         typedef std::pair<MemoryDataStreamPtr, CodecDataPtr> DecodeResult;
00146         virtual DecodeResult decode(DataStreamPtr& input) const = 0;
00147 
00150         virtual String getType() const = 0;
00151 
00154         virtual String getDataType() const = 0;
00155 
00162         virtual bool magicNumberMatch(const char *magicNumberPtr, size_t maxbytes) const 
00163         { return !magicNumberToFileExt(magicNumberPtr, maxbytes).empty(); }
00171         virtual String magicNumberToFileExt(const char *magicNumberPtr, size_t maxbytes) const = 0;
00172     };
00176 } // namespace
00177 
00178 #endif
